alert.note: Alert for White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central White County through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enfield, or 7 miles west of Carmi. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central White County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
